name: Minima22: Tarot!Tarot!Tarot!
description:
"A memory game? A Mem-or-y game! Ha! Is that all I see before me?" boomed the Baron.

The Princess was taken aback. "Does this make it any less worthy?" asked the Princess.

"But I have seen this game a thousand times before. Tis simply a matter of turning one card over and then another and hope they match. A simple game of chance and memory".

"Maybe the creator just wanted to create such a thing for their own amusement. Maybe the care not for you moaning and whining."

"Pah!" exclaimed the Baron.
